fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Fullname: Nguyen Tien Loi 
Date of Birth: August 25th, 1985 
Mobile: (+84)389 322 958 
E-mail: nguyenloi85@gmail.com  
Skype: nguyenloi85 
Marital status: Single 
Address: 32/38 Van Phu, Phu La,Ha Dong, Ha 
Noi, Vietnam 
Profile: 
I am a resourceful programmer. I developed software and website in 9 years with many projects. My 
products used many programming language, for example : C, C++, Java, PHP… . Now I am 
freelancer. I build website with PHP. I work with customers from Vietnam and foreign country . I’m 
good at PHP, especially with PHP core, zend framework, laravel and codeigniter. 
Skill summary 
• 
PHP 
• 
Zend Framework1-2-3 , Codeigniter, Wordpress, laravel, Slim framework 
• 
HTML, HTML5 
• 
CSS, CSS3, LESS, SASS 
• 
Javascript, ajax, jquery, angular, reactjs 
• 
Front-end Bootstrap, Foundation framework, UIKit framework 
• 
Database : Oracle, mysql, Sql Server, PgSql, noSql, json 
• 
XML 
• 
Java Core 
• 
Delphi 
• 
C/C++ in linux 
• 
Design Partner 
• 
UML 
• 
Linux,Unix, AIX,Sun Solaris, Windows 
Certificate: 
Germany A1 Certificate 
Germany A2 Certificate 
Germany A2+Work Certificate 
Education: 
• 
2004-2009 Post and Telecommunications Institute of Technology(Hoc vien cong nghe 
Buu Chinh Vien Thong)in Ha Noi, Vietnam 
Degree: Bachelor of Technological Information 
• 
2000-2003 Lac Long Quan high school in Hoa Binh city, Vietnam 
10th to 12th class 
1996-2000 Huu Nghi secondary school in Hoa Binh City, Vietnam 
5th to 10th class 
1991-1996 Cao Thanh elementary school in Ung Hoa, Ha Noi,  Vietnam 
1st to 5th class 
• 
• 
Employment History: 
Freelancer 
Freelancer Web developer 
10/2019 – now 
• I use PHP  
Thuan Thanh Tech 
Team leader 
7/2019 – 9/2019 
• I manage team to develop an education manage application with laravel. This website 
application  is a bridge between school and parents. School can communicate with 
parents via website effectively. It also manages almost things which is related to 
education 
• I maintained the old website with drupal 6. This website is about a contact book online 
Sutunam 
PHP Web Developer 
6/2019 – 7/2019 
• 
I learned shell script for using linux and magento 1.x 
• 
I developed 2 module blog and image slider for magento 1. 
Freelancer 
Freelancer Web developer 
1/2013 – 6/2019 
• 
I’ve developed websites as a freelancer for the both Vietnamese and foreign clients. In this 
period of time, I not only fixed many errors but also developed a lot of functions from small to 
important ones for my client in both backend and front end. I worked in a lot of project, from 
small to big, only a part of project to full project. 
• 
I mainly worked in project used php core, codeigniter(version 2 and 3) and zend 
framework(both version 1 and 2). But sometimes I joined anothers projects used wordpress, 
some kind of custom code, unfamiliar platform (blogspot, tumblr…)… when my customer 
want. 
• 
Here’re some my recent projects 
+ I’ve just upgraded an old website with zend framework 1. It’s about a law company in USA. 
I fixed some bugs related to sending mail system. Moreover, I added some functions for them. 
+ I took part in a project form online service for sparrowlogics with slim framework, zend 
framework, javascript core, reactjs… 
+ I developed and modified some modules, chat, slideshow, user … for a german artist’s 
website. He bought a laravel scripts and needed to customize it. It’s a website about storing 
photo. 
+ I developed some module in accounting online system for a german company. ( 
buchhaltungsbutler ). It’s related to calculate bill online, export to pdf, automatic dunning 
system… These modules was in zend framework and used motsly javascript/ajax to build 
front-end. Moreover I coded some wordpress plugin for them. 
+ I took part in upgrading module translation omeka from omeka classic to omekas. Omeka 
classic use zend framework 1.x. Omekas use zend framework 3.x 
Wise Concetti Ltd 
Senior Software Developer 
2/2012– 12/2012 
• 
I taked part in developing  project for a Korea client with SQL IDE(integrated development 
environment ) using delphi and java(java swing, java core…). 
• 
I designed inteface and icon for software 
• 
I joined in the analysis and system design progress of the project. 
• 
I developed many main function of software  like visual sql(drap and drop table, view, 
trigger… in database to generate sql command),  auto complete sql, highlight syntax.. for sql 
command, sofware configuration... 
• 
I were responsible for helping, managing junior developers’s work. 
Vietsoftware International 
Software Engineer 
5/2010 – 2/2012 
• 
I taked part in developing  projects with the IBM client of my company. 
• 
I developed file upload and download manager software supported for multi OS(AIX, cygwin, 
linux, sun solaris…). We using wxWidget for building up interface, cUrl for uploadding and 
downloading file, xerces-c for parsing xml file… 
• 
I also supported for installing library in AIX, linux OS, cygin by hand. I directly downloaded 
source code of libries above. Next I compiled all libraries with command line(confige, make, 
make install…). In case, if any  libraries were  incompactive with the OS, I would have to 
modify source code of these libraries. 
• 
I supported for changing code from a particular code manager system of IBM  to the CVS 
system. 
• 
I reorganized all codes file in project with multi languages (C/C++, perl, python, shell script…) 
Citigo 
Junior Web Developer 
1/2010 – 4/2010 
• 
I taked part in developing  3 websites used cakephp, codeigniter and wordpress for Australian 
client. 
• 
The first website used cakephp was about a company with many sub-centres. I supported for 
senior devoper fixing cross browser (IE, Firefox, Opera…) error about html/css, javascript 
error, php error. 
• 
The second website used codeigniter was about news website. I supported for senior devoper 
fixing cross browser (IE, Firefox, Opera…) error about html/css, javascript error, php error. 
Moreover, I developed some functions in backend, for example : manage users, category, 
news…  
• 
In the last website used wordpress, I developed a wordpress plugin about text advertisement 
February 2012 -  December 2012 
like google adsense 
Onenet 
Trainee Web Developer 
10/2009 – 12/2009 
• 
My main duty was learning joomla and developing 2 joomla components for a wine company-
Avinaa. 
• 
The first one was file system manager in the back-end part. It allowed user to upload and 
manage image and video. 
• 
The second one was about exporting content in xml format in the front- end part. Afterwards 
another teammate will use flash to read xml format. 
• 
Modified some  joomla modules and components. 
• 
Modified template for website use joomla cms. 
iWay Vietnam 
Trainee Web Developer 
7/2009 – 9/2009 
• 
My main duty was learning drupal and supporting for senior developer with small tasks in 
large tasks. For example: write some functions with a specific input and output, write a part of 
a drupal module… 
• 
I modified template for website use drupal cms 
• 
I coded some simple sample modules 
Freelancer 
No company 
5/2009 – 6/2009 
• 
I developed a part of back-end and front-end in a file upload manager project using zend 
framework 1 
• 
I fixed some errors in some website with php core and javascript. 
Additional Information: 
Language 
Vietnamese - Mother tongue  
English - Fluent written and good at spoken 
German – Good 
Hobby 
Playing and watching football  
Reading book 
Advantages 
I can work independence and I also good at teamwork. 
I am hardworking. 
Ability to prioritize, planning skills, well-organized, multitasking and assuming responsibilities and 
duties. 
Possessing the capacity to cope with failures and trying to learn from past mistakes 
Disadvantages 
Sometime I’m too focus in my job when I’m dealing with hard tasks. So I usually ignore my co-worker  
around me. It makes me unfriendly in their eyes.

experiences.detail:
• I manage team to develop an education manage application with laravel. This website application is a bridge between school and parents. School can communicate with parents via website effectively. It also manages almost things which is related to education
• I maintained the old website with drupal 6. This website is about a contact book online

• I learned shell script for using linux and magento 1.x
• I developed 2 module blog and image slider for magento 1.

• I’ve developed websites as a freelancer for the both Vietnamese and foreign clients. In this period of time, I not only fixed many errors but also developed a lot of functions from small to important ones for my client in both backend and front end. I worked in a lot of project, from small to big, only a part of project to full project.
• I mainly worked in project used php core, codeigniter(version 2 and 3) and zend framework(both version 1 and 2). But sometimes I joined anothers projects used wordpress, some kind of custom code, unfamiliar platform (blogspot, tumblr...)... when my customer want.
• Here’re some my recent projects
+ I’ve just upgraded an old website with zend framework 1. It’s about a law company in USA. I fixed some bugs related to sending mail system. Moreover, I added some functions for them.
+ I took part in a project form online service for sparrowlogics with slim framework, zend framework, javascript core, reactjs...
+ I developed and modified some modules, chat, slideshow, user ... for a german artist’s website. He bought a laravel scripts and needed to customize it. It’s a website about storing photo.
+ I developed some module in accounting online system for a german company. ( buchhaltungsbutler ). It’s related to calculate bill online, export to pdf, automatic dunning system... These modules was in zend framework and used motsly javascript/ajax to build front-end. Moreover I coded some wordpress plugin for them.
+ I took part in upgrading module translation omeka from omeka classic to omekas. Omeka classic use zend framework 1.x. Omekas use zend framework 3.x

• I taked part in developing project for a Korea client with SQL IDE(integrated development environment ) using delphi and java(java swing, java core...).
• I designed inteface and icon for software
• I joined in the analysis and system design progress of the project.
• I developed many main function of software like visual sql(drap and drop table, view, trigger... in database to generate sql command), auto complete sql, highlight syntax.. for sql command, sofware configuration...
• I were responsible for helping, managing junior developers’s work.

• I taked part in developing projects with the IBM client of my company.
• I developed file upload and download manager software supported for multi OS(AIX, cygwin, linux, sun solaris...). We using wxWidget for building up interface, cUrl for uploadding and downloading file, xerces-c for parsing xml file...
• I also supported for installing library in AIX, linux OS, cygin by hand. I directly downloaded source code of libries above. Next I compiled all libraries with command line(confige, make, make install...). In case, if any libraries were incompactive with the OS, I would have to modify source code of these libraries.
• I supported for changing code from a particular code manager system of IBM to the CVS system.
• I reorganized all codes file in project with multi languages (C/C++, perl, python, shell script...)

• I taked part in developing 3 websites used cakephp, codeigniter and wordpress for Australian client.
• The first website used cakephp was about a company with many sub-centres. I supported for senior devoper fixing cross browser (IE, Firefox, Opera...) error about html/css, javascript error, php error.
• The second website used codeigniter was about news website. I supported for senior devoper fixing cross browser (IE, Firefox, Opera...) error about html/css, javascript error, php error.
Moreover, I developed some functions in backend, for example : manage users, category, news...
• In the last website used wordpress, I developed a wordpress plugin about text advertisement

• My main duty was learning joomla and developing 2 joomla components for a wine company-
Avinaa. • The first one was file system manager in the back-end part. It allowed user to upload and manage image and video.
• The second one was about exporting content in xml format in the front- end part. Afterwards another teammate will use flash to read xml format.
• Modified some joomla modules and components.
• Modified template for website use joomla cms.

• My main duty was learning drupal and supporting for senior developer with small tasks in large tasks. For example: write some functions with a specific input and output, write a part of a drupal module...
• I modified template for website use drupal cms
• I coded some simple sample modules
• I developed a part of back-end and front-end in a file upload manager project using zend framework 1 • I fixed some errors in some website with php core and javascript.
